dumpPermissions

hasPermission

boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String spaceAlias, java.lang.String uri, java.util.List roleList, java.util.List permissionList, java.util.Map args = null )
Find out if the permission name supplied is granted for the role, spaceAlias and uri
Parameters:
spaceAlias - The url alias of the space you are checking permissions for. If no permissions are found for this space, the "any" permissions will be used
uri - The uri the user needs permission to access. Will look up the url path to find nearest ancestor with permissions, or default to space's default permissions if no uri-specific permissions set for ancestors of this uri
roleList - The list of roles the user has
permissionList - The list of permissions required to perform the action
args - Optional map of arguments used for more detailed permissions access etc restriction by type
